column1: * The Third Kinslaying: the remaining Sons of Fëanor of Fëanor
column3: attack the remnants of Doriath and Gondolin at the Mouths of Sirion.

column1: * Círdan and Gil-galad send aid to the Havens. The arrive too late and the people are defeated; the refugees move to the Isle of Balar.
* Elrond and Elros are taken captive by Maglor
column2: but Maglor comes to love the boys and fosters them.

column3: casts herself into Belegaer. Ulmo bears her up in the likeness of a swan and she finds Eärendil.
